entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Québec
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:33 p.m. EDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 5.6°C
